about.title: ABOUT SERVICE CRYPTOHUB
about.subTitle: Advantages of working with our service
about.cardDesc1: Using multi-level server protection. Security and control system for digital assets. The service is included in authoritative monitoring and listings. Guarantee of receipt of funds, subject to compliance with the exchange rules of the service
about.cardDesc2: Always up-to-date and profitable exchange rates from the world's leading exchanges. No hidden fees or additional fees. Fixing and agreeing on the exchange rate with the client subject to cash exchange
about.cardDesc3: Convenient modern resource. Automatic search for the best rates of world crypto exchanges for making transactions. Automatic cryptocurrency exchange using bank cards. Accessible and understandable interface for everyone
about.cardDesc4: Information about users is not stored on the service. Maintain strict confidentiality. We respect your desire not to disclose personal information about yourself. Information about applications is stored in encrypted form
about.cardDesc5: Wide selection of payment systems for withdrawal of funds and exchange directions. Exchange in a currency convenient for the client. High speed of transactions and application processing. 24/7 automatic cryptocurrency exchange
about.cardDesc6: We provide thoughtful tools with high conversion rates. API and other integration formats. Help and advice with connecting to the service. Providing box solutions

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.text1: We are ready to offer additional discounts for regular customers for the Bitcoin exchange direction - Privat24. In this case, the discount is an additional payment to the payment received.
partnership.text2: Let's consider an example: in total you exchanged the equivalent of 5000 USD in any currency with us. Now you are exchanging btc for 14,000 hryvnia, to this amount you will receive an additional payment of 0.05% * 14,000 = 7 hryvnia.
